languages.text: Каждый раз, когда псайкер использует свои {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}психосилы{/g}, завеса между реальным миром и варпом {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}истончается{/g}, что может вызвать пси-морок. Пси-морок больше сбивает с толку, чем представляет реальную угрозу: он вторгается в мысли тех, кто окружает псайкера, вызывает предзнаменования и видения. Пси-морок уменьшает значение {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}моментума{/g} отряда, отвлекает персонажей от сражения, снижает их боевой дух и приводит к неудачам. Псайкеры могут быть санкционированными или несанкционированными. Шанс, что санкционированный псайкер вызовет пси-морок, в два раза ниже, чем у несанкционированного, который получает +1 к {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}пси-рейтингу{/g}.
languages.original_text: Each time a psyker uses their {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}Psychic Powers{/g}, the veil between the realspace and the warp {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}degrades{/g}, which can trigger the Psychic Phenomena. Psychic Phenomena are more disconcerting than actually dangerous — intruding into the thoughts of people around the psyker or causing omens and visions. Psychic Phenomena reduces the {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}Momentum{/g} of the party, distracting them from combat, ruining their morale or causing bad luck. Psykers can be sanctioned or unsanctioned — chances that sanctioned psykers will cause Psychic Phenomena are halved, while unsanctioned psykers have +1 to Psy Rating.

traits.locale_text:
Каждый раз, когда псайкер использует свои {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}психосилы{/g}, вуаль между реальным миром и варпом {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}истончается{/g}, что может вызвать пси-морок.
Пси-морок больше сбивает с толку, чем представляет реальную угрозу: он вторгается в мысли тех, кто окружает псайкера, вызывает предзнаменования и видения. Пси-морок уменьшает значение {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}моментума{/g} отряда, отвлекает персонажей от сражения, снижает их боевой дух и приводит к неудачам. Псайкеры могут быть санкционированными или несанкционированными. Шанс, что санкционированный псайкер вызовет пси-морок, в два раза ниже, чем у несанкционированного, который получает +1 к пси-рейтингу.

Каждый раз, когда псайкер использует свои {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}психосилы{/g}, вуаль между реальным миром и варпом {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}истончается{/g}, что может вызвать пси-морок.
Пси-морок больше сбивает с толку, чем представляет реальную угрозу: он вторгается в мысли тех, кто окружает псайкера, вызывает предзнаменования и видения. Пси-морок уменьшает значение {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}моментума{/g} отряда, отвлекает персонажей от сражения, снижает их боевой дух и приводит к неудачам. Псайкеры могут быть санкционированными или несанкционированными. Шанс, что санкционированный псайкер вызовет пси-морок, в два раза ниже, чем у несанкционированного, который получает +1 к пси-рейтингу.

languages.text: Each time a psyker uses their {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}, the veil between realspace and the warp {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}degrades{/g}, which can trigger psychic phenomena. Psychic phenomena are more disconcerting than dangerous — intruding into the thoughts of people around the psyker or causing omens and visions. Psychic phenomena reduce the {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} of the party, distracting them from combat, lowering their morale, or just causing bad luck. Psykers can be sanctioned or unsanctioned — chances that sanctioned psykers will cause psychic phenomena are halved, while unsanctioned psykers instead have increased chances and +1 to their {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g}.
languages.original_text: Каждый раз, когда псайкер использует свои {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}психосилы{/g}, завеса между реальным миром и варпом {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}истончается{/g}, что может вызвать пси-морок. Пси-морок больше сбивает с толку, чем представляет реальную угрозу: он вторгается в мысли тех, кто окружает псайкера, вызывает предзнаменования и видения. Psychic phenomena are more disconcerting than dangerous — intruding into the thoughts of people around the psyker or causing omens and visions. Psychic phenomena reduce the {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} of the party, distracting them from combat, lowering their morale, or just causing bad luck. Psykers can be sanctioned or unsanctioned — chances that sanctioned psykers will cause psychic phenomena are halved, while unsanctioned psykers instead have increased chances and +1 to their {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g}.

Psykers can be sanctioned or unsanctioned — chances that sanctioned psykers will cause psychic phenomena are halved, while unsanctioned psykers instead have increased chances and +1 to their {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g}.

Each time a psyker uses their {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil{/g} between realspace and the warp degrades, which can trigger psychic phenomena. Psychic phenomena are more disconcerting than dangerous — intruding into the thoughts of people around the psyker or causing omens and visions. Psychic phenomena reduce the {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} of the party, distracting them from combat, lowering their morale, or just causing bad luck. Psykers can be sanctioned or unsanctioned — chances that sanctioned psykers will cause psychic phenomena are halved, while unsanctioned psykers instead have increased chances and +1 to their {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g}.

Each time a psyker uses their {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}, the veil between realspace and the warp {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}degrades{/g}, which can trigger psychic phenomena. Psychic phenomena are more disconcerting than dangerous — intruding into the thoughts of people around the psyker or causing omens and visions. Psychic phenomena reduce the {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} of the party, distracting them from combat, lowering their morale, or just causing bad luck. Psykers can be sanctioned or unsanctioned — chances that sanctioned psykers will cause psychic phenomena are halved, while unsanctioned psykers instead have increased chances and +1 to their {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g}.

languages.text: Wenn ein Psioniker seine {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psionischen Kräfte{/g} einsetzt, wird der Schleier zwischen Realraum und Warp {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}abgebaut{/g}, was psionische Phänomene auslösen kann. Psionische Phänomene sind eher beunruhigend als gefährlich – sie dringen in die Gedanken der Kreaturen in der Umgebung des Psionikers ein oder verursachen Omen und Visionen. Psionische Phänomene verringern die {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Dynamik{/g} der Gruppe, lenken sie vom Kampf ab, senken ihre Moral oder bringen einfach nur Pech. Psioniker können sanktioniert oder nicht sanktioniert sein – die Chance, dass sanktionierte Psioniker psionische Phänomene verursachen, wird halbiert; während nicht sanktionierte Psioniker eine erhöhte Chance haben und +1 auf ihren {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}Psi-Wert{/g} erhalten.
languages.original_text: Each time a psyker uses their {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}, the veil between realspace and the warp {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}degrades{/g}, which can trigger psychic phenomena. Psychic phenomena are more disconcerting than dangerous — intruding into the thoughts of people around the psyker or causing omens and visions. Psychic phenomena reduce the {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} of the party, distracting them from combat, lowering their morale, or just causing bad luck. Psykers can be sanctioned or unsanctioned — chances that sanctioned psykers will cause psychic phenomena are halved, while unsanctioned psykers instead have increased chances and +1 to their {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Immer wenn ein Psioniker seine {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}psionischen Kräfte{/g} einsetzt, wird der Schleier zwischen Realraum und Warp abgebaut, was {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psionische Phänomene{/g} auslösen kann. Psionische Phänomene sind eher beunruhigend als gefährlich – sie dringen in die Gedanken der Kreaturen in der Umgebung des Psionikers ein oder verursachen Omen und Visionen. Psionische Phänomene verringern die {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}Dynamik{/g} der Gruppe, lenken sie vom Kampf ab, senken ihre Moral oder bringen einfach nur Pech. Psioniker können sanktioniert oder nicht sanktioniert sein – die Chance, dass sanktionierte Psioniker psionische Phänomene verursachen, wird halbiert; während nicht sanktionierte Psioniker stattdessen eine erhöhte Chance haben und +1 auf ihren {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}Psi-Wert{/g} erhalten.

languages.text: Chaque fois qu'un psyker utilise ses {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}pouvoirs psychiques{/g}, le voile entre l'espace réel et le Warp se {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}dégrade{/g}, ce qui peut déclencher des phénomènes psychiques. Ces phénomènes psychiques sont plus déconcertants que dangereux. Ils s'immiscent dans les pensées des personnes qui entourent le psyker ou sont à l'origine de présages et de visions. Les phénomènes psychiques réduisent la {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}fougue{/g} du groupe, en détournant son attention du combat, en influant sur son moral ou simplement en lui portant malchance. Les psykers peuvent être assermentés ou non assermentés. Les risques qu'un psyker assermenté provoque un phénomène psychique sont réduits de moitié, tandis qu'un psyker non assermenté a plus de risques et +1 d'{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}indice psy{/g}.
languages.original_text: Each time a psyker uses their {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}, the veil between realspace and the warp {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}degrades{/g}, which can trigger psychic phenomena. Psychic phenomena are more disconcerting than dangerous — intruding into the thoughts of people around the psyker or causing omens and visions. Psychic phenomena reduce the {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} of the party, distracting them from combat, lowering their morale, or just causing bad luck. Psykers can be sanctioned or unsanctioned — chances that sanctioned psykers will cause psychic phenomena are halved, while unsanctioned psykers instead have increased chances and +1 to their {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois qu'un psyker utilise ses {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}pouvoirs psychiques{/g}, le voile entre l'espace réel et le Warp se dégrade, ce qui peut déclencher des {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}phénomènes psychiques{/g}. Ces phénomènes psychiques sont plus déconcertants que dangereux. Ils s'immiscent dans les pensées des personnes qui entourent le psyker ou sont à l'origine de présages et de visions. Les phénomènes psychiques réduisent la {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}fougue{/g} du groupe, en le distrayant du combat, en influant sur son moral ou simplement en lui portant malchance. Les psykers peuvent être assermentés ou non assermentés. Les chances qu'un psyker assermenté provoque un phénomène psychique sont réduites de moitié, tandis qu'un psyker non assermenté dispose de plus de chances et de +1 en termes d'{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}indice psy{/g}.

languages.text: 每当灵能者使用{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}灵能能力{/g}时，真实世界与亚空间之间的障壁就会{g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}恶化{/g}，可能会导致灵能异象。 灵能异象比普通的危险更加令人不安，它会入侵灵能者身边所有人的思想，或引发恶兆与异象。灵能异象会降低整支队伍的{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}士气{/g}，分散他们的注意力，降低士气，也可能仅仅是让他们厄运缠身。灵能者分为合法灵能者与非法灵能者，合法灵能者触发灵能异象的几率减半，而非法灵能者的{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}灵能等级{/g}提高1级，但触发灵能异象的几率更高。
languages.original_text: Each time a psyker uses their {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}, the veil between realspace and the warp {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}degrades{/g}, which can trigger psychic phenomena. Psychic phenomena are more disconcerting than dangerous — intruding into the thoughts of people around the psyker or causing omens and visions. Psychic phenomena reduce the {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} of the party, distracting them from combat, lowering their morale, or just causing bad luck. Psykers can be sanctioned or unsanctioned — chances that sanctioned psykers will cause psychic phenomena are halved, while unsanctioned psykers instead have increased chances and +1 to their {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 每当灵能者使用{g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}灵能灵力{/g}时，真实世界与亚空间之间的障壁就会恶化，可能会导致{g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}灵能异象{/g}。 灵能异象比普通的危险更加令人不安，它会入侵灵能者身边所有人的思想，或引发恶兆与异象。灵能异象会降低整支队伍的{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}士气{/g}，分散他们的注意力，降低士气，也可能仅仅是让他们厄运缠身。灵能者分为合法灵能者与非法灵能者，合法灵能者触发灵能异象的几率减半，而非法灵能者的{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}灵能等级{/g}提高1级，但触发灵能异象的几率更高。

languages.original_text: Each time a psyker uses their {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}psychic powers{/g}, the veil between realspace and the warp {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}degrades{/g}, which can trigger psychic phenomena. Psychic phenomena are more disconcerting than dangerous — intruding into the thoughts of people around the psyker or causing omens and visions. Psychic phenomena reduce the {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}momentum{/g} of the party, distracting them from combat, lowering their morale, or just causing bad luck. Psykers can be sanctioned or unsanctioned — chances that sanctioned psykers will cause psychic phenomena are halved, while unsanctioned psykers instead have increased chances and +1 to their psy rating.

languages.text: Cada vez que un psíquico utiliza sus {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}poderes{/g}, el velo entre el espacio real y la disformidad {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}se vuelve más tenue{/g}, lo que puede provocar fenómenos psíquicos. Los fenómenos psíquicos son más desconcertantes que peligrosos, y se manifiestan en la mente de las personas que rodean al psíquico o a través de premoniciones y visiones. Los fenómenos psíquicos reducen el {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}ímpetu{/g} del grupo al distraerlos del combate, reducir su moral o generando mala suerte. Los psíquicos pueden ser autorizados o no autorizados: la probabilidad de que los psíquicos autorizados causen fenómenos psíquicos se reducen a la mitad, mientras que los no autorizados tienen más probabilidades de provocarlos y reciben un +1 a su {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}factor psíquico{/g}.
languages.original_text: Each time a psyker uses their {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}, the veil between realspace and the warp {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}degrades{/g}, which can trigger psychic phenomena. Psychic phenomena are more disconcerting than dangerous — intruding into the thoughts of people around the psyker or causing omens and visions. Psychic phenomena reduce the {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} of the party, distracting them from combat, lowering their morale, or just causing bad luck. Psykers can be sanctioned or unsanctioned — chances that sanctioned psykers will cause psychic phenomena are halved, while unsanctioned psykers instead have increased chances and +1 to their {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que un psíquico utiliza sus {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}poderes{/g}, el velo entre el espacio real y la disformidad se vuelve más tenue, lo que puede provocar {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}fenómenos psíquicos{/g}. Los fenómenos psíquicos son más desconcertantes que peligrosos, y se manifiestan en la mente de las personas que rodean al psíquico o a través de premoniciones y visiones. Los fenómenos psíquicos reducen el {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}ímpetu{/g} del grupo al distraerlos del combate, reducir su moral o generando mala suerte. Los psíquicos pueden ser autorizados o no autorizados: la probabilidad de que los psíquicos autorizados causen fenómenos psíquicos se reducen a la mitad, mientras que los no autorizados tienen más probabilidades de provocarlos y reciben un +1 a su {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}factor psíquico{/g}.

languages.text: 異能者が{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}超能力{/g}を使用するたびにリアルスペースと<歪み>の境界にあるヴェールが{g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}弱体化{/g}し、これにより心霊現象が引き起こされる。 心霊現象は危険というよりは混乱をきたすものであり、異能者の周囲の人々の心の中に入り込んだり、予知や幻影を引き起こしたりする。心霊現象は部隊の{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}推進力{/g}を低下させ、彼らの気を戦闘から逸らし、またモラルを低下させたり不運をもたらしたりする。異能者には認定異能者/公認異能者と非認定異能者がいる。認定異能者/公認異能者が心霊現象を引き起こす確率は、非認定異能者が引き起こす確率に比べ半分である。非認定異能者が心霊現象を引き起こす確率はより高く、{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}超能力レート{/g}が+1増加する。
languages.original_text: Each time a psyker uses their {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}, the veil between realspace and the warp {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}degrades{/g}, which can trigger psychic phenomena. Psychic phenomena are more disconcerting than dangerous — intruding into the thoughts of people around the psyker or causing omens and visions. Psychic phenomena reduce the {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} of the party, distracting them from combat, lowering their morale, or just causing bad luck. Psykers can be sanctioned or unsanctioned — chances that sanctioned psykers will cause psychic phenomena are halved, while unsanctioned psykers instead have increased chances and +1 to their {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 異能者が{g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}超能力{/g}を使用するたびにリアルスペースと<歪み>の境界にあるヴェールが弱体化し、これにより{g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}心霊現象{/g}が引き起こされる。 心霊現象は危険というよりは混乱をきたすものであり、異能者の周囲の人々の心の中に入り込んだり、予知や幻影を引き起こしたりする。心霊現象は部隊の{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}推進力{/g}を低下させ、彼らの気を戦闘から逸らし、またモラルを低下させたり不運をもたらしたりする。異能者には認定異能者/公認異能者と非認定異能者がいる。認定異能者/公認異能者が心霊現象を引き起こす確率は、非認定異能者が引き起こす確率に比べ半分である。非認定異能者が心霊現象を引き起こす確率はより高く、{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}超能力レート{/g}が1増加する。

languages.text: Bir ruhsezer her {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}ruhsezi gücü{/g} kullandığında, gerçekuzay ile öteboyut arasındaki örtüyü {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}bozar{/g}. Bu da ruhsezi fenomenlerini tetikleyebilir. Ruhsezi fenomeni, tehlikeliden ziyade rahatsız edicidir. Ruhsezerin çevresindeki insanların düşüncelerine sızarak kehanetlere ve hayallere sebep olur. Ruhsezi fenomenleri grubun {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentumunu{/g} azaltarak dikkatlerini çatışmadan uzaklaştırır, morallerini düşürür veya yalnızca kötü şansa sebep olur. Ruhsezerler onaylı veya onaysız olabilir. Onaylı ruhsezerlerin ruhsezi fenomeni tetikleme olasılıkları onaysızlara kıyasla yarı yarıya düşüktür. Ayrıca onaysız ruhsezerler {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}ruhsezi derecelerine{/g} +1 alırlar.
languages.original_text: Each time a psyker uses their {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}, the veil between realspace and the warp {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}degrades{/g}, which can trigger psychic phenomena. Psychic phenomena are more disconcerting than dangerous — intruding into the thoughts of people around the psyker or causing omens and visions. Psychic phenomena reduce the {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} of the party, distracting them from combat, lowering their morale, or just causing bad luck. Psykers can be sanctioned or unsanctioned — chances that sanctioned psykers will cause psychic phenomena are halved, while unsanctioned psykers instead have increased chances and +1 to their {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g}.
